reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 623/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - BRUCE COUNTY
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 623/98: DELEGATION OF AUTHORITY - BRUCE COUNTY
reg_info.act_under: Planning Act   Loi sur l’aménagement du territoire

content.content: 1. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of The Corporation of the County of Bruce with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Bruce whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 1 (1). (2) All authority of the Minister in respect of applications for amendments to the official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Bruce that were made to the local municipalities before May 22, 1996 but not adopted by the councils of the local municipalities before the date on which this Order comes into force is delegated to the council of The Corporation of the County of Bruce. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 1 (2).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) The Minister’s authority to approve official plans and amendments to official plans under the Act is delegated to the council of The Corporation of the County of Bruce with respect to official plans and amendments to official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Bruce whose file numbers are set out in the Schedule. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 1 (1).

(2) All authority of the Minister in respect of applications for amendments to the official plans for the local municipalities of the County of Bruce that were made to the local municipalities before May 22, 1996 but not adopted by the councils of the local municipalities before the date on which this Order comes into force is delegated to the council of The Corporation of the County of Bruce. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 1 (2).

content.content: 2. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council in section 1 is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 2 (1). (2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 2 (2).
content.raw_html:
2. (1) If any of the authority delegated to the council in section 1 is in turn delegated by the council to a committee of council or an appointed officer under subsection 5 (1) of the Act, the council shall forward to the Minister a certified copy of the delegating by-law within 15 days of its passing. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 2 (1).

(2) The delegation of authority set out in this Regulation is not terminated by reason only that subsection (1) is not complied with. O. Reg. 623/98, s. 2 (2).

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 623/98, s. 3. SCHEDULE 41-OP-0206-007 41-OP-0395 41-OP-0204 41-OP-0176 41-OP-0202-042 41-OP-0205 41-OP-0205-008 O. Reg. 623/98, Sched.
